text: a'bak) (nawaka) ruwalata idiripasata prathiwiruddha lesata sulan hamaddi mawithayata pathwu; wishmayata pathwu

me sandaha adhikshanayata lanwima siwil adhikari padmakumara mahatha, injineru sahakara aalawaka mahathath kagalla wathman widuli injineru thissa bandara mahathath pathkarana ladi.me samaja sathkaraya itha keti kalayak thula ema widyalaye sisu daru dariyange pariharanayata laba dunne kisima pudgalayakuge ho lanwima methsarana samaja sathkaraye palaka sawi nokaramini.ewan pasubimaka hiriwadunna widyalaye baladhariniyaka wisin loka banku aadhara matha me godanagilla idikala bawata samaru palakayak sawikaranu laba thibe.me pilibandawa wagakiwa yuththange awadhanaya yomuwiya yuthuya. ¬†.

muruthawela jalasha yojana kramaya saha uuruwela ha udukurunda jalasha prathisanskaranaya kirima osse athi kala wari pubuduwa nisa adatath hambanthota disthrikkaye gowi pawul dasa dahas ganan thama jiwitha sarthaka kara ganimata samathwa sitithi.yatath wijitha yugaye kriyathmaka wu idam prathipaththiya nisa, gamiyanta idam ahimi kara thibu yugayaka owunta rajaye idam laba dimata da, gowi janapada athi kirimata da, gam pulul kirima yatathe nawa gammana athi kirimata da gath wadagath piyawara nisa me wana wita ema wyapara wala dewani paramparawa da thrupthimath jiwitha gatha kirimata samathwa atha.epamanak nowa, adhyapana pahasukam athin itha pasu ba siti hambanthota disthrikkaye du daruwange nanasa padima sandaha thama ida kadam pawa parithyaga karamin pasal aarambha kirimata gath uthsahaya nisa ada wana wita wishwa widyala adhyapanaya labuwan dahas gananak hambanthota disthrikkaya thula daknata atha.
nam kirim : anan manan, deshapalakaya, wikara, wipakshaya adahas (11)
samahara awasthawaladi yak gawayinge ha bataluwange kithu kithu kala siruru mitiyawathwalin hamuwi thiyenawa.
ihatha ha pahatha suthra aththenma amuthuwen katapadam kirimata awashya natha.
hamoma thamanta kamath dewal liyayi apita anumatha karanna bari unath ee liyana kenage sathutata badha karanna honda nahane.

samupakara ha abhyanthara welenda katayuthu pilibanda amathya jonstan pranandu mahathage illima matha paribhogika adhikariya ema simenthi rasayanagara wetha yawa pariksha karawime karthawyaya baragena thibe.ee anuwa lowa honda rasayanagaraya wetha simenthi yawa in labena thaththwa sahathikaya saha merata shri lanka pramithi aayathanaya nikuth kala thaththwa sahathikaya athara samanathawaya salakillata bhajanaya kerena athara shri lanka pramithi aayathanaye adhikshanaya yatathe parikshanayata yawe.danata welenda pole pawathina simenthi thoga paribhogikayata sudusu pramithiyakata anuwa sakasenawada nadda soya balimata swadhina parikshanayak pawathwima samupakara ha abhyanthara welanda katayuthu pilibanda amathyanshaye aramunayi.me yatathe rajaye aayathana samagam menma paudgalika wyaparika aayathana aanayanaya karana simenthi sampalada mema wishesha parikshanayata yomu kirimata niyamithawa atha..
